text: George Adamski (April 17, 1891 â€“ April 23, 1965) was a Polish-born American who became known in ufology circles after he said he photographed ships from other planets, met with aliens, and took flights with them. He considered himself to be a "philosopher, teacher, student and saucer researcher." == References == Category:1891 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Writers from California Category:Writers from Oregon Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from Wyoming
